title: The Economics of Nuclear Power, Including Administration and Law
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. New York is mentioned as a publisher location for the parent serial, and might be also mentioned in some volumes of this series.
Spot-checks of volumes did not turn up copyright notices.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Kelsey LeClair for copyright research on this title.
